description:
A rack mounted basket to make trips to the farmer’s market, or pedal-powered picnics, easier than ever. A bike basket can be a beautiful thing, from keeping your favourite beverages from rolling away, to a ready made stash spot for extra layers, or even a cockpit for your little 4-legged co-pilots. The Up-Town Rack City basket clips on and off your pannier rack, pop it off to load it up, pop it back on to ride. Made from waterproof fabric, this basket keeps your gear nice and dry. A cloth lid stretches over the top (like a kayak hatch cover) further protecting the contents from the weather, or hiding a surprise dessert from fellow picnickers.

  • Rugged Cordura® nylon with a waterproof PU coating
  • Waterproof lid keeps your contents safe from spring showers
  • Lid has 2 loop handles for easy access, without needing to fully open the basket
  • Zippered internal pocket protects your phone, wallet, etc
  • Aluminum frame with internal stabilizers keeps the basket basket-shaped, even when it’s empty
  • Tilting handle for comfy off-bike carry
  • Highly reflective 3M™ Scotchlite™ reflector on front of bag
  • Compatible with almost all racks 80-160mm wide
  • Suitable for rack diameter of 8-16mm
  • Convenient release handles on both sides
  • Anti-slip device prevents movement on the luggage carrier
  • Audible “click” lets you know when the connection is secure
  • Maximum load capacity of 10kg
name: Ortlieb Up-Town Rack City Basket
